TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {40497=There are currently no TrueCar Certified Dealers offering Guaranteed Savings on this 2016 Kia Sorento within 150 miles of Arlington, TX., 37635=No Texan should make the mistake of paying the MSRP (sticker price) for a new Kia. TrueCar shows you the average price other people are actually paying for new cars at Arlington Kia dealers. TrueCar compiles and analyzes recent Texas sales transaction data which includes extensive exterior color, interior color, special packages, manufacturer and dealer installed options, and any manufacturer incentives for new 2016 Kia models. Many Texas Kia buyers prefer options such as Bluetooth hands free, a navigation system, alloy wheels, leather seats, heated seats, a DVD player, an MP3 player, a backup camera, LED and Xenon lights. Using TrueCar, you can configure your preferred vehicle and communicate directly with new Texas Kia dealers to get a great deal on a new Kia for the Arlington area., 37294=Live in or near Arlington, TX and need to know what other people are paying for new vehicles?
